entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JIT: Optimize "x == a && y == b" #104767
  • ILCompiler.Compiler.Tests.SwiftLoweringTests.VerifyLowering failing with preivew 6 #104765
  • HttpClient sents full request during NTLM NEGOTIATE #104745
    Future
  • ILLink analyzer: implement warnings for DAM on type #104742
  • ILC: missing warning for DAM on type when used through derived type #104740
  • HTTP Metrics & Tracing: provide a way to Opt-In `url.scheme` #104738
    10.0.0
  • [browser][WBT] SignalRPassMessageWasmBrowser - NU1903 - System.Text.Json 8.0.0 #104737
    9.0.0
  • SettingsProperty constructor ignores serializeAs parameter if it is not SettingsSerializeAs.Binary #104732
  • Microsoft.Gen.OptionsValidation.Unit.Test.EmitterTests.ProduceDiagnosticFromOtherAssemblyTest failed in CI #104723
    Future
  • HttpClient.Send not supported in MAUI running on Android or iOS causing PlatformNotSupportedException #104716
    Future
  • System.Linq.Expressions: Expression.Variable in lambda called from loop not correctly re-initialised on each loop iteration #104715
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 1 Regression in System.Tests.Perf_Int128 #104739
  • System.IO.Ports.SerialPort not working on linux-musl-arm #104710
  • [android] Connection issues in Sockets and Functional networking tests #104709
  • Issue with Azerbaijani Culture in .NET 8 Blazor WebAssembly Standalone App #104717
    9.0.0

Closed

  • CILJit::compileMethod :: Slow processing #103751
    9.0.0
  • ILLink: Trim analyzer doesn't report AOT warnings caused by reflection access to annotated methods within compiler generated methods #101998
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 4 Regressions on 4/11/2024 11:29:08 PM #101134
  • UnhandledExceptionEventHandler in MemoryCache can cause a deadlock. #64115
    8.0.0
  • Building runtime on ARM64 uses x86 tools? #96141
    9.0.0
  • ILLink analyzer: redundant warnings for annotation mismatch on DIM #104746
  • Indirect dependency on vulnerable System.Text.Json 8.0.0 through Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Json #104705
  • Plans for opt-in OpenTelemetry attribute implementation and configuration? #103302
    9.0.0
  • Add NET 8.0 target to Microsoft.Bcl.Memory package #104185
    9.0.0
  • FileSystemWatcher_InternalBufferSize_SynchronizingObject test failed in CI #103495
  • [browser][ST] Wasm tests timeout #103246
    9.0.0
  • Occasional crashes in System.Net.Sockets.Tests on Alpine 3.15 #85666
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] System.Buffers.ArrayPool.Tests.ArrayPoolUnitTests.RentAndReturnManyOfTheSameSize_NoneAreSame #103943
    9.0.0
  • Expose Json in SqlDbType #103925
    9.0.0
  • QUESTION: NullReferenceException message details #104703
  • System.Text.Json 8.0.4 - No Authorization Manager set. #104719
  • Property 'JsonPropertyInfo.DeclaringType' has 'internal' access modifier #104706
  • [Linker][Tests] HttpClientTests fails with System.Net.Http.HttpRequestException: The SSL connection could not be established #104682
    9.0.0
  • [Test Failure] System.Net.Security.Tests.SslStreamNetworkStreamTest.SslStream_RandomSizeWrites_OK #104605
    9.0.0
  • ConfigurationRoot GetValue behavior changed #103353

PullRequests

Created

  • Some more cleanup to regex NonBacktracking #104766
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Uncomment disabled test that has been fixed #104764
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Second attempt at fixing ARM64 cross compilation #104763
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix ISOSDACInterface::GetThreadData reading the GC alloc context. #104762
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix issue link for an expected difference in warning behavior #104760
    linkable-framework, needs-area-label
  • cDac work necessary to get the MethodTableName #104759
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Qualify the well-known IntPtr SpecialTypeInfo instance #104758
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Don't warn for reflection access to compiler-generated code #104757
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/6.0-staging] Add libicu74 as a known ICU version #104756
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-Setup
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add libicu74 as a known ICU version #104755
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-Setup
  • Add libicu74 as a known ICU version #104754
    NO-MERGE, os-linux, area-Setup, 9.0.0
  • Fix trim warnings for base method implementing interface #104753
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Value num refine phis #104752
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Bump the stj version to avoid error #104751
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix zlib-ng build failure caught in the sdk CI #104750
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enable embedding install location options in apphost #104749
    area-Host
  • HTTP Metrics: Uncoditionally report server.port #104741
    area-System.Net.Http, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.0
  • System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters: fix target framework check for source-build. #104735
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] Testing OOM in System.Buffers.Tests #104734
    arch-wasm, area-GC-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Cleanup some code under FEATURE_STUBS_AS_AL #104731
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Do not ignore `MemoryMarshal.TryWrite` result in `Guid` #104728
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Delete FEATURE_READYTORUN_COMPILER ifdef #104727
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Android] Improve SslStream PAL buffer resizing #104726
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android
  • [NO REVIEW] Check if first prefix is HTTP/2.0 or HTTP/1.1 in WinHttp #104722
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • Add Sve.ScatterXBitYNarrowing() on Arm64 #104720
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Don't make web requests in HttpClient trimming test #104718
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/6.0] Disable SslStress and HttpStress runs #104714
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http
  • [HTTP/2] Throw meaningful exception if we get GOAWAY while reading response body #104707
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Added Sve.CreateBreakPropagateMask #104704
    arch-arm64, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation

Merged

  • Condition DurationHistogram_HasBucketSizeHints on RemoteExecutor #104736
    area-System.Net
  • NonBacktracking Regex optimizations #102655
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Provide fix for #81093 - "Mono does not emit ProcessExit event on SIGTERM" #100056
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Don't dispose timers if we're in our UnhandledException handler. #103937
    area-System.Runtime.Caching, 9.0.0
  • [ICorProfiler] Add new API to enumerate GC Heap objects #103735
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [WASI] use 64bit WASI SDK on windows #104733
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • [wasi] back to WASI_SDK_PATH and detection improvement #104729
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • SPMI: Increase helix timeout for superpmi-diffs job #104725
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add NET 8.0 target to Microsoft.Bcl.Memory package #104648
    area-System.Buffers
  • [release/8.0] Use latest .NET version in HttpStress runs #104711
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http
  • Use latest released SDK for HttpStress. #104713
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Use ARM64 tools when building on ARM64 hosts #104695
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Enhancing the SqlDbType with Json #103985
    area-System.Data
  • Fix frame boundary detection in SslStream #104606
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Fix various asserts that were found by Antigen #104625
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Do more DSA parameter sanity checking up front #104646
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0

Updated

  • Activities for Http Connections, Dns, Sockets and SslStream #103922
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • Add runtime metrics in `System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource` #104680
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • Intrinsify typeof(T).GetGenericTypeDefinition() #103528
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update SDK to preview 6 #104696
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Ported interleaving support to System.IO.Packaging #97898
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2493189 #103583
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Add randomized allocation sampling #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • ARM64-SVE: Add `TrigonometricMultiplyAddCoefficient` #104697
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Fix PHI non-null pattern #104493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Refine post-dominance check in strength reduction #104687
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable "Allocate on stack" for NAOT/R2R #104411
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Throw InvalidOperationException on RuntimeMethodHandle.GetFunctionPointer() for generic methods #104644
    area-System.Reflection, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Straighten out flow during early jump threading #104603
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update docs for ByRefLike with generics for work in .NET 10 #103318
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] When reconciling shadow stack after catch, look for RhpThrowHwEx2 as well. #104652
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Ensure mono wasm jiterpreter handles v128_bitcast #104698
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Skip exact interface matches when an interface has variance #103757
    area-VM-meta-mono, runtime-mono
  • [Wasi] switch to preview 2 #104683
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • Error out when the size of a field is too big #104393
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • JIT: Added SVE `GetFfr`, `SetFfr`, `LoadVectorFirstFaulting`, `GatherVectorFirstFaulting` #104502
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Windows CNG virtualization-based security #102495
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [Android] Link native shared libraries with 16k page alignment #104577
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • ILLink: Fix order dependent logic for DAM on types #104701
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [browser] Use StaticWebAssets fingerprinting in Wasm SDK #103755
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Decompose some bitwise operations in HIR to allow more overall optimizations to kick in #104517
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ARM64-SVE: Add `AddSequentialAcross` #104640
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • [Mono] [swift-interop] Add support for reverse pinvoke argument lowering #104437
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono] unify and vectorize implementation of decode_value metadata API #100048
    area-VM-meta-mono, runtime-mono
  • Add support for `SwiftSelf<T>` in Mono JIT and Interpreter #104171
    area-Codegen-meta-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Optimize 'x & cns == cns' pattern #103868
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • ARM64-SVE: Add `TrigonometricSelectCoefficient`, `TrigonometricStartingValue` #104681
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • ARM64-SVE: Add `FloatingPointExponentialAccelerator` #104649
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Disable code formatting in code we want to keep as is #95986
    area-Meta
  • Expose `JsonElement.DeepEquals` #104579
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Optimize BigInteger.ToString for large decimal string #104676
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • JIT: Transform multi-reg args to FIELD_LIST in physical promotion #104370
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasi] upgrade to WASIp2 + wasi:http #103752
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • [NOREVIEW][NOMERGE] HTTP/3 stress data corruption hunt #101624
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Add SearchValues<char> implementation for two sets of 128 chars #103216
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • Replace Ubuntu 18 images with Ubuntu 20 in ARM 64 runs #104689
    area-System.Net.Security
  • JIT: Prove some cases where strength reducing to GC pointers is ok #104679
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] tests and fixes for heap larger than 2GB #104662
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Copy prop equivalent phis #104458
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Replace use of target dependent `TestZ` intrinsic #104488
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • [Apple-Mobile][Globalization] Refactoring of CalendarData.iOS and new DateTimeFormatInfo* tests #102464
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V][LoongArch64] New passing info for floating-point structs #103945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] Fix System.Net.Sockets.Tests on Qemu #104094
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource] Tracing out of proc sampling #104134
    area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, community-contribution
  • [mono][swift-interop] Support for Swift struct lowering in direct P/Invoke returns #104389
    arch-arm64, arch-x64, area-Codegen-meta-mono, 9.0.0
  • SPMI: Fix a few memory leaks #104691
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Set GCStressIncompatible on GenericContext tests #104686
    needs-area-label
  • Add DivRem with DivisionRounding (WIP + Review request) #104589
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Use `GetArrayDataReference` in `Vector*` #104532
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-11
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT LLVM] Support dotnet.js #2434

PullRequests

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] support `System.Net.Http.HttpClient` on WASIp2 #2614
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • A/V crash in Comparer<SdkFeatureBand>.Default during dotnet new #42113
  • dotnet sln add: doesn't add MAUI project for Deploy #42108
  • Create a new `dotnet new` template for launchSettings.json #42107
  • dotnet clean and build [or dotnet rebuild] as one command #42096
  • AzureDevops pipeline issue when trying to install .NET 8 Sdk #42093
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/8.0.1xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #42092
  • [NETSDKE2E]Warning "NU1903: Package 'System.Text.Json' 6.0.0 has a known high severity vulnerability, https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-hh2w-p6rv-4g7w" displays after building mstest project in CLI. #42091

Closed

  • Intermittent test project build failures #42045
  • build error with nuget audit #42073
  • dotnet nuget -h|--help doesn't display why #42084

PullRequests

Created

  • Add a top-level --with-system-libs arg to build.sh #42120
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update SB CI to alpine 3.20 #42119
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2493186 #42118
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #42117
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #42116
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #42115
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #42114
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove dead version properties and unnecessary package refs #42109
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Add Alma Linux SB CI leg to validate min glibc support #42106
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add support for targeting Windows version 26100 and update Windows SDK projection versions #42090
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix double build of test packages for Helix #42083
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.1xx #42074
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Revert "Disable templating tests on windows to unblock PR builds" #42051
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update implicit versions for July #42052
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #42080
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #42081
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #42050
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.3xx #42075
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update to the 8.0.7 July release #42054
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Moved src/Assets to test/TestAssets #41924
    untriaged, Area-dotnet new
  • Clean up STJ references Fixes #39902 #40645
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Testing sbrp changes #42028
    DO NOT MERGE
  • Fix detection of torn SDK #41907
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Permit loose manifest priority #41996
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-Workloads, 8.0.8
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #41885
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update .editorconfig template with new defaults #42059
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use PackageDownload in torn builds #41951
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update scancode to 32.2.1 #42079
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Attempt to fix Publish60Hosted_Works test #42061
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Debug Assert errror #74362
  • Gracefully handle incomplete property setter in object initializer #74348
    Backlog
  • Rename session randomly dismisses itself #74347
  • Building and packing Roslyn twice on the command line fails #74345

Closed

  • Confusing error message about determinism and AssemblyVersion in VB #30738
    Backlog
  • Visual Studio hive preparation can take 15 minutes in roslyn-integration-CI #59851
    17.6 P2
  • Source generators, how to add project reference? #55003
  • Add internal API to fold FlowAnalysisAnnotations into the symbol's TypeWithAnnotations #47635
  • Update corefx dependencies to 6.0.0 #57875
    17.6 P2
  • Test plan for "generic attributes" #36285
    17.0
  • Ensure warnings reported from Helix job are included in AzDO job #60512
  • CultureInfo.CurrentCulture API banned in Analyzers but alternative API is inaccessible #66566
    17.13
  • Test Plan for "Params Collections" feature #71137
    17.12
  • CSC : error CS0041: Unexpected error writing debug information -- 'Insufficient memory to continue the execution of the program.' #73447
    17.11
  • Error/Warning messages on network share are not navigable #74105
  • Implicit Usings don't appear greyed out like other unused usings #72776
  • Collection Initializer cannot handle Extensions akin to `IEnumerable<T>.Add(IEnumerable<T>)` ( `IDE0028` vs `CS0029`) #72460
  • CS7038: Failed to emit module if new collection syntax is used with an implicit ImmutableArray operator. #74185
  • Remove IBuiltInAnalyzer.OpenFileOnly #74048
  • Can only build Roslyn.sln a single time before building breaks (2) #74156
    17.11 P3
  • IImplementInterfaceService is implemented by calling a code action, but it should be the other way around #60990
    Backlog
  • Create LangVersion 13 #74194
    17.12
  • Analyzers created with Microsoft.CodeAnalysis 4.4.0 cannot be used with .net 6 #65562
  • Update vs to Version 17.4.0 Preview 2.0 from PREVIEW 1 cause errors in publish worker service #64184
  • Cache contains wrong information about COM interop after changes in the COM interfaces #73191
  • Source generator doesn't see DefaultMemberAttribute #73229
  • Source Generators referencing nuget packages cannot be debugged in VS #74027
  • [Source Generators] ISyntaxReceiver instances should be able to access AdditionalFiles #74167
  • CodeGen for defaulted collection expression elements (Span via InlineArray) #74184
  • Hitting Debug.Assert in the compiler (TypeWithAnnotations.cs) #74297
    17.12
  • Analyzer dependency loading is different in shadow copy scenarios. #66532
    17.6

PullRequests

Created

  • Interceptors refkind differences #74363
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add IsEnabled property to IEditorInlineRenameService #74361
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Convert HideAdvancedMembers option to editorconfig option #74360
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Simplify passing around of FAR symbol groups #74358
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix debug assert with operation blocks in invalid code #74354
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove the ProjectDiagnosticAnalyzer type #74353
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle span conversions in expression trees #74349
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Revert "Extensions: Emit and roundtrip underlying instance field (#73407)" #74346
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #74344
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Fix UnscopedRef handling in indexers #74343
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Clarify error for AssemblyVersion with wildcard when deterministic VB #74351
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Remove diagnostic category flag #74352
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Use primary constructors #74359
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Eliminate IdeAnalyzerOptions #74357
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • Add a ParamCollection test which uses the attribute included in .NET 9 SDK #74338
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Optimize codegen for collections expression of single spread of `ReadOnlySpan` for collection builder emit strategy #73102
    Area-Compilers, Blocked, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Do not include collection expression conversion to nullable value type in ClassifyStandardImplicitConversion() #74251
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Work around MSBuild task ordering bug #74205
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fix layering of Implement-Interface code-fixer vs language service #74320
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Note that toolset package layout is hard-coded in SDK #74301
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Handle missing System.Nullable type #74330
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged, Next
  • Switch implicit span to conversion from type #74232
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Remove fallbacks (3) #74323
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove 'open file only' concept from analyzer driver #74340
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Always check get method parameters in override indexer #74337
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.12
  • Remove fallbacks and providers (4) #74336
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use correct get / set inside ref safety analysis #73842
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge Internal/release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.8 #74335
  • Support long chains of `else if` statements #74317
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update VSSDK #74329
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JsonSerializerIsReflectionDisabled exception in Blazor despite using Source Generator. #56752
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes_ef, https #56751
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #56750
  • Document how to disable display templates using UIHintAttribute #56747
  • [Blazor] MapStaticAssets incorrectly re-encodes files when running the published output in the development environment. #56742
    .NET 10 Planning
  • CascadingValueSource crashes because subscriber are added asynchronously #56741
    9.0-rc1
  • Navigate to incorrect URL when launch the .NET 9.0 Web API project with IIS Express. #56740
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudGetProductDetails #56739
  • I just want to ask, in blaozr wasm, why can't we use httpclient to carry the windows identity, but use the browser's featch can and don't need to set up, you don't want us to continue to use wasm, is it? #56736

Closed

  • MinimalApis using MapGroup are not exposed by the .NET 9 WithOpenApi method #56585

    9.0-preview7
  • Perf regression: single_query #56718
  • Perf regression: fortunes #56671
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries #56738
  • Fixes to generated schemas for some primitive types #56730
  • `services.AddDefaultIdentity(configureIdentityOptions, configureAuthenticationOptions)` #44364
    Backlog
  • Blazor DotNetStreamReference Race condition when arrayBuffer is not awaited/read in javascript with using keyword. #53376
    9.0-preview7
  • Minimal API Endpoint gives "Invalid antiforgery token" error #56687
  • Perf improvement: plainTextEmptyFilter #56728
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps #56729

PullRequests

Created

  • Add support for CreateSchemaReferenceId option #56753

  • update tsaconfig #56749

Merged

  • Port fix for #53423 to `main` #56702
    area-security, 9.0-preview7
  • Enable internal runtimes and disable old creds #56428
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview7
  • Fix type/formats for primitive types #56745
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 9.0-preview7
  • AddConnections: AddRouting -> AddRoutingCore #56703
    area-signalr, 9.0-preview7

Updated

  • Support key deletion in Data Protection #53860
    area-dataprotection
  • Add support for the Partitioned cookie attribute #55371
    area-networking
  • Improve Kestrel connection metrics with error reasons #55565
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Enable input number component to support type='range' attribute #55583
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add support for trusting dev certs on linux #56582
    area-networking
  • [Infrastructure] Update jquery validate periodically #56725
    area-mvc
  • Add disable HTTP metrics endpoint metadata #56036
    area-hosting
  • Improve performance of UriHelper.GetDisplayUrl #55611
    Perf, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Do not close connection for http1.0 when client request connection keep-alive #56558
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Navigation Exception: Introduce Clear Message #56644
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Improve endpoint extension method docs #56713
    area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to set toolbar overflow menu color if not using shell. #23563
  • The MAUI App Template still doesn't build because of the splash screen #23562
  • Unable to Navigate Between Entries Using Tab Key #23559

    Backlog
  • On IOS - After Updating new Package Microsoft.Maui.Controls-8.0.70 App is not Compiling #23554

Closed

  • [.NET 9 Preview 6, Windows] Resizetizer may create some images that are larger than 200KB, which fail the Windows App Cert Kit test #23564
  • Sqlite issue in MAUI after upgrade from Xamarin forms application to MAUI application #23555
  • iOS App build fails when using MAUI 8.0.70 #23557
  • Win platform WebView cannot be release after its parent window get close #22972
    Backlog
  • WebView MAUI WinUI Memory Leak #20283
    Backlog
  • Failure Building Due to Splash Screen Image splashSplashScreen.png #23363
  • [Properties > Build Actions] options available depend on order of TargetFrameworks in .csproj - Cannot see all options at once - Only the first OS's options are shown #23523
  • Provide a better error message or try to load PNGs if user specifies svgs #23275
  • IOS build failed with "You may also need to include 'iossimulator-x64' in your project's RuntimeIdentifiers" #23352

PullRequests

Merged

  • use MathF where possible #19965

  • Remove mobile test from running on desktop #23550
  • [android]: ModalContainer Destroy commit allowing state loss #23400
    community ✨
  • [net9.0] Update to preview7 versions #23544
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • HybridWebView control for integrating JS/HTML/CSS easily into a .NET MAUI app #22880

  • [iOS] Span's TapGestureRecognizer not working if text is truncated #22213
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-gestures
  • [Windows] Add TitleBar Control #23019

    community ✨
  • Android ecosystem updates based on net9.0 branch #23271
    area-infrastructure
  • [iOS] Read only Editor is editable when Next from on screen keyboard #22501
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-keyboard, area-controls-editor
  • [net9.0] Enable back the failing Shell tests #22830
    area-controls-shell, area-testing, testing-reenable
  • [Windows] Avoid crash doing Application.Current.CloseWindow of hidden Window #22852
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-window
  • Don't throw exceptions on back-to-back window deactivations #23519
    platform/windows 🪟
  • Make sure resizetized image files are writable #23412
  • [CI] Bump xcode 15.3.0 #22611
    do-not-merge, area-infrastructure
  • Batch CollectionChanged events #20036
    legacy-area-perf, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, t/perf
  • [Core] Enforce CA1507 - use nameof() where possible #21962

    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
